item.title: Reinforcement Learning with Adaptive Regularization for Safe Control of Critical Systems
item.description: Safe reinforcement learning is achieved via RL-AR, an algorithm that combines a safe policy with an RL policy using a focus module, ensuring safety during training while achieving competitive performa…
